mapper.insert: insert into cinema (name, local, address, tel, totalTheater, totalSeat, trafficInfo, parkingInfo, intro) values (#{name}, #{local}, #{address}, #{tel}, 0, 0, #{trafficInfo}, #{parkingInfo}, #{intro})
mapper.select: select num,name from cinema where local=#{local};
mapper.update: update cinema set name=#{name}, local=#{local}, address=#{address}, tel=#{tel}, totalTheater=#{totalTheater}, totalSeat=#{totalSeat}, trafficInfo=#{trafficInfo}, parkingInfo=#{parkingInfo}, intro=#{intro} where num=#{num}
update cinema set totalTheater=totalTheater+1, totalSeat=totalSeat+#{totalSeat} where num=#{num}
mapper.select: select local from cinema group by local
select * from cinema order by local
mapper.update: update cinema set totalTheater=totalTheater-1, totalSeat=totalSeat-#{seatCount} where num=#{cinemaNum}
